publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1643 Hugh Henry: Media Coverage of European Affairs—That the Parliament notes with regret the decision of The Herald to dispense with the services of its journalist in Brussels which follows similar decisions by other media organisations; notes that with the exception of Business AM’s proposed appointment of a Brussels correspondent, Scotland’s media will be unrepresented in Brussels, and believes that it is in Scotland’s interests that political, economic and judicial decision making in the European Union is fully covered by the Scottish media.
S1M-1643 Media Coverage of European Affairs (lodged on 9 February 2001) Shona Robison*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-1643 Media Coverage of European Affairs (lodged on 9 February 2001) Cathy Jamieson*, Alex Neil*, Trish Godman*
S1M-1643 Media Coverage of European Affairs (lodged on 9 February 2001) Dennis Canavan*, Robert Brown*, Mr John McAllion*

S1M-1643 Hugh Henry: Media Coverage of European Affairs—That the Parliament notes with regret the decision of The Herald to dispense with the services of its journalist in Brussels which follows similar decisions by other media organisations; notes that with the exception of Business AM’s proposed appointment of a Brussels correspondent, Scotland’s media will be unrepresented in Brussels, and believes that it is in Scotland’s interests that political, economic and judicial decision making in the European Union is fully covered by the Scottish media. Supported by: Shona Robison, Donald Gorrie, Cathy Jamieson, Alex Neil, Trish Godman, Dennis Canavan, Robert Brown, Mr John McAllion, Michael Russell*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Nora Radcliffe*, Karen Whitefield*, Ian Jenkins*, Rhoda Grant*
S1M-1643 Media Coverage of European Affairs (lodged on 9 February 2001) Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-1643 Media Coverage of European Affairs (lodged on 9 February 2001) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-1643 Media Coverage of European Affairs (lodged on 9 February 2001) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1643 Media Coverage of European Affairs (lodged on 9 February 2001) Alasdair Morgan*, Elaine Smith*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mike Watson*, Michael Matheson*

S1M-1643 Media Coverage of European Affairs (lodged on 9 February 2001) Mr Murray Tosh*
S1M-1643 Media Coverage of European Affairs (lodged on 9 February 2001) Tricia Marwick*, Andrew Wilson*
